data.message: Trying to post a message to facebook.  I am sick of the ads on my facebook account.  I don't know how to block them or hide them.  I feel angry when I see political adds.  If this doesn't stop I will log off facebook forever.  I can't get facebook to answer me.

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Karen. Ads help keep Facebook free and we strive to only show ads that are relevant and interesting to you. If you don't want to see a specific ad, you can click the x on the top right corner of the ad and choose hide. This will ensure that you no longer see this ad in your News Feed. Please let us know if you have any feedback at: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO. -Jenny
It is unnerving to be doing something on facebook and all of a sudden an ad pops up............who really cares??????????
what ads do you get ?i only see the ads on the right side and sometimes in the homepage
Then stop using Facebook for free.  Simple as that.  LOL.
